title-group.article-title: The Origins of the Translator's Workstation

abstract.p: The first proposals for various component tools of what is now called the "translator's workstation" or "translator's workbench" are traced back to the 1970s and early 1980s in various, often independent, proposals at different stages in the development of computers and in their use by translators.
